articles.title: Larry Ellison Provides Personal Guarantee for Paramount’s Bid for Warner
articles.mainIdea: Larry Ellison Provides Personal Guarantee for Paramount’s Bid for Warner
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Larry Ellison Provides Personal Guarantee for Paramount’s Bid for Warner. He agreed to personally guarantee $40.4 billion of equity financing for the deal and publish records related to the family trust that backstops it. Related tickers mentioned: PSKY, WBD.

articles.title: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.
articles.mainIdea: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.. Paramount Skydance amended its offer for Warner Bros. Discovery on Monday, guaranteeing the backing of Oracle founder Larry Ellison following the rejection last week of its hostile bid. Paramount said in a news release that it wouldn’t be raising its offer of $30 a share for all of Warner Discovery. “Our $30 per share, fully financed all-cash offer was on Dec. 4, and continues to be, the superior option to maximize value for WBD shareholders… We expect the board of directors of WBD to take the necessary steps to secure this value-enhancing transaction and preserve and strengthen an iconic Hollywood treasure for the future,” David Ellison said. Related tickers mentioned: ORCL, PSKY, WBD.
